name: Temp to Perm
description:
You've been hired to throw everything in an abandoned office into an incinerator. 

WASD move

Mouse look

Click to pickup/interact

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/spencerer/sets/temp-to-perm-score

This game is loosely based on a temp job I had this summer.  I wanted to explore the possibility space of being in a professional environment where your only instruction is to get rid of things. 

I had a lot of fun tweaking the physics and throwing mechanics.  This game is somewhat of a power fantasy because I had to use a time-consuming handtruck for all the huge glass and steel poster frames I had to transport. It was very difficult to texture my  game, I've definitely learned my lesson about uniform walls.
